message: Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $1,100,000. It's a steal considering its value to you.  What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $950,000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $980,000 for the product. I think that's a fair compromise.

Bob, I'm  starting to get concerned about our ability to reach an agreement.  I'm willing to come down to $1,020,000, but this is truly my final offer. I'm confident the product will be worth more to you than that, but I'm not willing to go lower.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $990,000 for the product. I think that's a fair compromise considering the value it will bring to me.
